flash clock

2006-07-07

I've had this concept in my head for awhile now.... now that it's done I realize you can't readily tell time on it, because the faces rotate in relation to their parent faces. So now I consider it a time-sculpture without practical use. But maybe one could get used to it...
watch it spin
Can you figure out the date and time represented in the above capture?
